properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kristu Paska yetu
amechinjwa sadaka,
Mwana wake Mungu
amechinjwa sadaka,
(Tuile Karamu yake
na tuimbe Aleluya,
Aleluya) x2.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Aliyejitoa sadaka
ya Paska,
sote tumtolee sadaka
ya sifa,
(Tuile karamu yake
na tuimbe Aleluya,
Aleluya) x2.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ametukomboa kondoo wake,
Katufananisha
na Mungu wetu,
(Tuile Karamu yake
na tuimbe Aleluya,
Aleluya) x2.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mauti uzima, vimeshindana,
Yeye al'okufa sasa yu mzima,
(Tuile Karamu yake
na tuimbe Aleluya,
Aleluya) x2.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Twaambie Maria uliona nini?
Mimi niliona kaburi li wazi,
(Tuile Karamu yake
na tuimbe Aleluya,
Aleluya) x2.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Malaika, leso pia na mavazi,
yote yashuhudia Kristu Mfufuka,
(Tuile Karamu yake
na tuimbe Aleluya,
Aleluya) x2.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Kristu kweli kweli
leo kafufuka,
Mfalme mshindaji,
utuhurumie.
(Tuile Karamu yake
na tuimbe Aleluya,
Aleluya) x2.
